prompt: Find all cancelled events on the calendar and delete them. When done, report the number of events deleted and list each one by title and ID.
gold_response: Found 2 cancelled events: 'CANCELLED: Board Meeting' (ev002) and 'CANCELLED: Sprint Planning' (ev004). Both were deleted from the calendar.

rubric.criteria: The agent must search or list events to discover which ones are cancelled
The agent must delete all cancelled events (ev002 and ev004)
The agent must report the titles or IDs of the events that were deleted
